channel.title: centos on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in centos on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Kernel
item.description: centos7 更新内核 在 CentOS 7 上启用 ELRepo 仓库 1 2 rpm --import https://www.elrepo.org/RPM-GPG-KEY-elrepo.org rpm -Uvh http://www.elrepo.org/elrepo-release-7.0-2.el7.elrepo.noarch.rpm 查询可下载的内核包 1 yum --disablerepo="*" --enablerepo="elrepo-kernel" list available 安装 1 yum --enablerepo=elrepo-kernel install kernel-ml 查看是否安装成功 1 rpm -qa |grep kernel
